resources.string: The map where you can find everything you are looking for
Welcome! Our app will guide you through the streets of Trento in search of places to explore and events to attend.
This icon will let you see interesting places
This other icon will let you see interesting events
See what others thought of this place and vote for it yourself.
Create itineraries between places\'s interest and events, or visit the proposals of other users
By clicking this symbol, you will be able to search for events or places or add new
Try a guided tour of the application
